Uses of Class
com.projetloki.genesis.image.Gradient

  • Packages that use Gradient 
    Package Description
    com.projetloki.genesis.image
    Library for rapidly generating CSS background images.

    • Uses of Gradient in com.projetloki.genesis.image

      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis.image that return Gradient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Gradient Gradients.circular(double xRatio, double yRatio)
      Returns a circular gradient.
      static Gradient Gradients.linear(Direction dir)
      Returns a linear gradient with the specified direction.
      static Gradient Gradients.linear(double theta)
      Returns a linear gradient with the specified direction, specified as an angle from the vector (1, 0).
      Gradient Gradient.transform(double y0, double y1)
      Returns a gradient that applies the specified linear function to the values returned by this gradient.
      Gradient Gradient.transform(MathFunction f)
      Returns a gradient that applies the specified function to the values returned by this gradient.
      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis.image with parameters of type Gradient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Image Image.erase(Gradient grad)
      Returns the image obtained by erasing this image gradually.
      Image Image.fill(Color color, Gradient grad)
      Returns the image obtained by filling this image gradually.
